text: Living room decorated for a small house party. People are chatting, holding drinks and sitting on a sofa.
Sarah welcomes her friends at the door.
Hi, come in! I’m so glad you could make it.
Thanks, Sarah. The place looks great!
Medium shot – Sarah, Alex and Mia standing near a table with snacks.
So, Alex, what do you usually do in your free time?
I love playing the guitar and watching football matches on TV. What about you?
I sometimes paint at the weekend, but I work out every day.
Close-up – Alex smiling.
That’s nice. Do you paint landscapes or people?
Mostly people. I like drawing faces. It’s relaxing.
Sarah joins in the conversation.
I like taking photos of nature. I go hiking every month with friends.
Sounds great! Where do you usually go hiking?
I like visiting the countryside and the seaside with my friends.
Alex, Sarah, Mia; guests chatting behind them.
What kind of music do you like, Sarah?
I love pop and indie music. I listen to Ed Sheeran a lot.
Me too! He’s my favourite singer.
Close-up – Mia and Sarah are listening to Alex.
I prefer rock music. I play in a small band with my friends.
Really? That’s cool! I can’t play any musical instruments.
Maybe you can play at my next party, Alex.
Sure, I’d love to.
Guests smiling, someone takes a group photo (selfie). Alex is fixing his hair.
Everyone, come closer! Let’s take a group photo.
OK, ready? Say cheese!
Wait, hold on. Let me fix my hair first.
